name: ririchiyo
description: A really cool discord.js music bot written in TypeScript.

scripts.build: (if exist dist rmdir dist /S /Q) && mkdir dist && tsc && cd dist && mkdir logs && (if exist ..\test_files cd ..\test_files && xcopy *.* ..\dist)
scripts.test: npm run-script build && npm run-script start:dev

author: Styxo
